a = int(input())
print('yes' if a % 3 == 0 or a % 6 == 1 else 'no')
print('yes' if int(input()) % 6 in [0, 1, 3] else 'no')

x = int(input())
i = 0
c = 1
if x % 3 == 0 or x % 6 == 1:
    print('yes')
else:
    print('no')

n = int(input())
x = n // 6
print('yes' if n == x * 6 or n == x * 6 + 1 or n == x * 6 + 3 else 'no')
print('yes' if int(input()) % 6 in [0, 1, 3] else 'no')

p = int(input())
print('yes' if p % 6 in [0, 1, 3] else 'no')

n = int(input())
print('yes' if n % 3 == 0 or n % 6 == 1 else 'no')

n = int(input())
print('yes' if (n % 3 == 0 or n % 3 == 1) and (n % 6 == 0 or n % 6 == 1 or n % 6 == 3) else 'no')
